name: byu-icon-sets
description: Icon sets for use with the BYU Web Standards
author: BYU Web Community

scripts.build-fa: mkdirp dist/fontawesome && fontello-svg --file-format {1}-{2}.svg --no-css --config ./src/fontello-config.json --out dist/fontawesome --fill-colors "white:rgb(256,256,256)|black:rgb(0,0,0)|navy:#002e5d" && svgo --config=src/logos/svgo.yml -f src/fontawesome --output dist/fontawesome
scripts.build-social: mkdirp dist/social && svgo --config=src/logos/svgo.yml -f src/social --output dist/social && node src/obfuscate-social.js dist/social dist/social/obfuscated
scripts.build: npm run build-fa && npm run build-logos && npm run build-social && npm run build-favicons && npm run build-byu
